data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lyu, Zhi-Tong, Wu, Jun, Wang, Jian, Sung, Yik-Hei, Liu, Zu-Yao, Zeng, Zhao-Chi, Wang, Xin, Li, You-Yu, Wang, Ying-Yong (2018): A new species of Amolops (Anura: Ranidae) from southwestern Guangdong, China. Zootaxa 4418 (6): 562-576, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4418.6.4|3 occurrences
